summary: A young, clairvoyant woman has a vision of a murder and sets out to uncover the truth before the killer finds her.
cast: Jackie Shroff|Madhuri Dixit|Javed Jaffrey|Laxmikant Berde|Moon Moon Sen|Sabeeha|Ajit Vachani|Jay Kalgutkar|Neelam Mehra|Shashi Kiran|Shivaaji Satam|Mahavir Shah|Kanti Karan Dharni|Raja Duggal|Ramakant Burman|Anthony Andrade|Vijay Arora|Harbans Darshan M. Arora|Prem Sagar
title: 100 Days
